text: England competed at the 1982 Commonwealth Games in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia, from 30 September to 9 October 1982. England finished second in the medal table. ==Medal table (top three)== The athletes that competed are listed below. ==Archery== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=250| Name
